title: ICT 2024 Asia Model / ATM Machine
description: Understanding the Asia model and ATM (Automated Trading Machine) concept.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• Asia session characteristics
• Range manipulation during Asia
• ATM Machine concept
• Gap magnet mechanics
• Asia high/low as liquidity pools
• Session expansion timing

quiz.question: Asia model focuses on:
quiz.explanation: The Asia model analyzes price action and range formation during the Asian session.

quiz.question: Range manipulation during Asia often:
quiz.explanation: Smart money builds liquidity pools at ranges during lower volatility Asia hours.

quiz.question: Expansion typically happens during:
quiz.explanation: After Asia builds the range, London/NY sessions deliver the expansion move.

quiz.question: ATM concept is linked to:
quiz.explanation: ATM is related to the gap magnet concept where price is pulled back to fill gaps.

quiz.question: Asia high/low acts as:
quiz.explanation: Asia high/low levels accumulate liquidity that becomes targets for later sessions.
